mapper.select: select psb.psb_seq psb_seq, psb.psb_title psb_title, psb.psb_writer psb_writer, psb.psb_thumb psb_thumb, ps.ps_age ps_age, ps.ps_gender ps_gender, ps.ps_address1 ps_address1, psb.psb_petType psb_petType, ps.ps_resident_type ps_resident_type, psb.psb_service psb_service, psb.psb_contents psb_contents, psb.psb_start_day psb_start_day, psb.psb_end_day psb_end_day, psb.psb_time psb_time, psb.psb_boardstatus psb_boardstatus from petsitter_board psb, petsitter ps where ps.ps_id=#{writer} and psb.psb_seq=#{seq}
select * from petsitter_board order by psb_seq desc
select count(*) from petsitter_board where psb_writer = #{psb_writer} and psb_boardstatus = 'yes'
select * from (select petsitter_board.*, row_number () over (order by psb_seq desc) rnum from petsitter_board)where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from reservation where petsitter_board_seq = #{psb_seq}
mapper.update: update cur_reserve set am = am - ${am} , pm = pm - ${pm} where parent_board_seq = #{parent_board_seq} and cur_date = #{s_cur_date}
mapper.select: select point from price where time = #{time} and pet_type = #{type}
select am, pm from cur_reserve where parent_board_seq=#{parent_board_seq} and cur_date between #{start_day} and #{end_day}
mapper.update: update member set mem_point = mem_point-#{rsv_point} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from waitlist where mem_id = #{mem_id} order by wait_seq desc) where rownum <= 1
select mem_point from member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
